name: Crimson Tides of Tethyr: Enhanced Edition
summary: A remaster of the classic Hall of Fame module for Neverwinter Nights: Enhanced Edition. A 20-hour adventure with a colorful cast of characters, epic war storyline, and tactically challenging encounters inspired by Baldur's Gate, this enhanced edition features rewritten dialogue, visual improvements, bug fixes, new systems and quality-of-life improvements, a new hour of gameplay content, and 100 new lines of voiced dialogue.
